title: BootCut Jeans
details: An eco-friendly electric scooter with a range of 50 miles on a single charge.
name: Electric Scooter
description: Our electric scooter is designed for urban commuting, offering a smooth ride with zero emissions.

reviews.review: Great scooter! Very convenient and environmentally friendly.
Love the design and the range. Perfect for my daily commute.
